name: Multistory Car Parking Plaza
description:
Car driving for multiple car owners in multistory parking plaza is really amazing. This valet driver simulation is perfect for the drivers who have excelled at the craft of driving. Bring the excelling driving qualities to the workplace. Park the car in the mall where the parking space is enough. One of the best free driving game around. Give the other valet drivers a tough time until they tap out. Drive the Dream cars and luxurious vehicles without being worried of buying them. Be a responsible driver like you are driving on the city streets.
Multistory Car Parking Plaza features:
• A driving multistory plaza legendary game with numerous missions
• Multiple vehicles of different horse powers to enjoy the simulation at the best.
• Various colored vehicle body is mesmerizing
• Reach the destination through the obstacles and barriers by driving like a pro valet driver.
• Beautiful animation and extremely attractive glossy checkpoints in the way
• Plant the good seeds for your reputation as the perfect valet driver by showing immense control on the car driving.
• Charm them by showing accurate driving and Parking exhibition
• No speed competition, just you and the ticking clock, reach the final checkpoint before the time ends.
• Give the guests and travelers at the hotel a royal treatment by completing the parking tasks for them.
